label: A17B2_hP38_194_fgjk_bc-001
title: Th$_{2}$Ni$_{17}$ Structure
comments:
This is an idealized form of the Th$_{2}$Ni$_{17}$ structure.  The actual composition can be as nickel rich as Th$_{2}$Ni$_{19}$. (Givord, 1972) 
 This is a superstructure of \href{current_web_home_dir/AB5_hP6_191_a_cg-001}{CaCu$_{5}$ ($D2_{d}$)} with nickel dimers aligned along the $z$-axis replacing thorium atoms. (Florio, 1956)
